pages.text: The $(mob)Death Worm$() is a monster found in $(thing)Deserts$(). It quickly moves burrowed under the $(item)Sand$() and attacks anything that comes nearby, including players and monsters, by lashing out with its jaws.
$(mob)Death Worms$() drop $(item)Death Worm Chitin$() on death of their respective color. It can be crafted into powerful armor.

$(mob)Death Worms$() may also drop a $(item)Death Worm Egg$() on death. It can be thrown to spawn a baby tamed $(mob)Death Worm$() that will slowly grow over time and patrols a 50 blocks area around its birth place. Unlike other tamed creatures, it acts exactly like a wild $(mob)Death Worm$(), but will simply never attack its owner.
